com.google.api.services.drive

Class DriveScopes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.services.drive.DriveScopes

  • public class DriveScopes
extends java.lang.Object
    Available OAuth 2.0 scopes for use with the Drive API.
    Since:
    1.4

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DRIVE
      View and manage the files in your Google Drive.
      static java.lang.String DRIVE_APPDATA
      View and manage its own configuration data in your Google Drive.
      static java.lang.String DRIVE_FILE
      View and manage Google Drive files and folders that you have opened or created with this app.
      static java.lang.String DRIVE_METADATA
      View and manage metadata of files in your Google Drive.
      static java.lang.String DRIVE_METADATA_READONLY
      View metadata for files in your Google Drive.
      static java.lang.String DRIVE_PHOTOS_READONLY
      View the photos, videos and albums in your Google Photos.
      static java.lang.String DRIVE_READONLY
      View the files in your Google Drive.
      static java.lang.String DRIVE_SCRIPTS
      Modify your Google Apps Script scripts' behavior.
